quote_first: It was 1:12 am when Father arrived at the police station. I did not see him until
quote_last: but I knew he was there because I could hear him. He was shouting, ‘I want to see my son,’ and ‘Why the hell is he locked up?’ and, ‘Of course I’m bloody angry.'
title: The Curious Incident Of The Dog In The Night-Time
author: Mark Haddon
